metadata.title: CVE-2022-32201 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libjpeg 1.63, there is a NULL pointer dereference in Component::SubXOfin component.hpp.

criterions.comment: libjpeg6b: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
libjpeg-turbo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjpeg9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
